Name: Homebound
About the game: A Journey Home You set out on adventures to explore the world. It feels like you've seen all there is to see. But now, maybe it's time to visit home. It's been so long, you're not even sure you know the way. With your platforming skills, clever use of badges you find along the way, and advice from people you meet, you are sure to find your way home in the end! Creative Platforming Use badges you find along the way to enhance your platforming capabilities. Make clever use of combinations of badges to make it through every challenge you will face on your way home. Estimated Playtime: 30-90 minutes In the same time it takes to grab a pizza, take a journey through this comical, colorful world.
Meta Title: Homebound: Jul 9, 2021, Nicholas Angle and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Homebound? Check out the release date (Jul 9, 2021), developer insights from Nicholas Angle, and a complete game summary.
